responseText: The great anvil... I have hewn runes of ancient Enchantment into its core, runes that should allow it to not just shape metal, but to channel and hold a willing (or compelled) elemental spirit. If these runes could be fully awakened, fully repaired from their current dormant state, the anvil itself could become a perpetual source of primal fire...
name: ANV_FTUE_0011_VarnoksJournal_4_Response
